title: Retro Bowl
description: The perfect game for the armchair quarterback. Can you lead your team to the championship?
Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!

title: Doodle Jump
description: Jump as high as you can in this classic arcade experience.

title: HexGL
description: A high-speed futuristic racing game. Test your reflexes!

title: Little Alchemy 2
description: Mix elements to create the world from scratch.

title: Cookie Clicker
description: The ultimate idle game. Bake as many cookies as you can!

title: Paper.io 2
description: Capture territory and become the largest player on the board.

title: Eaglercraft
description: Classic block-building survival in your browser.
